questions.question: What is the dominant color of the pet feeder's main body?
What is the overall shape of the pet food dispenser?
What appears to be the primary material of construction?
What color is the smaller, secondary food compartment?
How many separate meal compartments are visibly present?
What type of mechanism is used for portion control?
Is there an apparent digital display or screen present?
Does the feeder have any visible text or branding on it?
What is the apparent texture of the feeder's surface?
What appears to be the method for accessing food compartments?
Is there a visible cover or lid for the entire device?
What type of pet is depicted on the packaging box?
What seems to be the intended purpose of this device?
Is there any indication of a power source requirement?
What is the apparent size of the food compartments relative to each other?
